title: pretty much how i feel about kai'sa

embed.description: Kai'sa, the Daughter of the Void, was recently revealed after a customary teasing period. We've been waiting for Kassadin's daughter to reveal herself for years and years now, and now that she has... I'm not altogether impressed. Let's talk about that! ----------------- EVELYNN update - The Good Sexy!

body: i completely agree with everything this guy said her designs fine but..could've been done better
